commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
version: '3.8'

services:
  postgres:
    image: postgres:14
    container_name: postgres
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: llm_user
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: securepassword
      POSTGRES_DB: llm_chat_db
    ports:
      - "5432:5432"
    volumes:
      - postgres-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./postgres/init.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sql
    networks:
      - llm-network

  ollama:
    build: ./ollama
    container_name: ollama
    ports:
      - "11434:11434"
    volumes:
      - ollama-data:/ollama
    networks:
      - llm-network

  haystack:
    build: ./haystack
    container_name: haystack
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://llm_user:securepassword@postgres:5432/llm_chat_db
      MODEL_HOST: ollama
      MODEL_PORT: 11434
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - ollama
    networks:
      - llm-network

  openweb-ui:
    build: ./openweb-ui
    container_name: openweb-ui
    ports:
      - "3000:80"
    environment:
      - NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://haystack:8000/api
    depends_on:
      - haystack
    networks:
      - llm-network

volumes:
  postgres-data:
  ollama-data:

networks:
  llm-network:
    driver: bridge
